refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If the value of man.indent.blurbs is non-zero, the width of the left margin for authorblurb, personblurb, and contrib output is set to the value of the man.indent.width parameter (3n by default). If instead the value of man.indent.blurbs is zero, the built-in roff default width (7.2n) is used.
